title: Camera Enabling Technologies Engineering Program Manager
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, resourceful people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. The people who work here have reinvented entire industries with all Apple Hardware products. The same passion for innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices strengthening our dedication to leave the world better than we found it. Do you want to join Apple in these pursuits? Join us to help deliver the next groundbreaking Apple products! Apple is seeking a Hardware Engineering Program Manager (EPM) to join the Camera Enabling Technologies team to drive design and development of early exploration platforms and technology building blocks that enable and influence product architecture decisions. The ideal candidate would be able to demonstrate their engineering background to proactively to lead a dedicated multi-functional engineering team through definition and Proof of Concept of new imaging technologies and architectures for Apple products. They would have a consistent track record of leading teams through developing complex hardware technology and working through ambiguity. This candidate would also command a deep understanding of the phases of technology development and how best to apply situational program management to organize, develop and orchestrate a program plan.
description: Drive project definition, resource management, milestones and timelines. Work cross-functionally to ensure necessary project support and prioritization. Ensure tight inter-team coordination and communication for an organization that’s internationally located. Grasp complex technical topics and abstract key issues and risks into an actionable form for executive management. Constantly engage in pro-active risk management, and effectively communicating status and issues to the development team and Apple executives. Strong presentation and communication skills required. Ability to travel internationally to support technology center and vendor activities.
preferred_qualifications: Exceptional program management and leadership skills: rigorous and proactive approach to orchestration of program plans, schedule estimates, and definition and management of project goals. In-depth technical engineering knowledge to effectively establish and manage projects especially through the early ambiguous definition phases, assess and drive technical risks, and critically challenge engineering decisions. Proven ability to effectively manage multiple global teams and vendors. Ability to bring focus and transparency to complex situations while monitoring the bigger picture and the needs of a rapid development cycle. Skilled at handling accountability without control, knowing how to identify and drive priorities from among the multiple issues competing for your attention. Excellent communication and conflict resolution skills Knowledge of imaging system design and/or camera key parts design, and subcomponents.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $136,300 and $248,700, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits. Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
